DateTimeZone::getName

(PHP 5 >= 5.2.0)

DateTimeZone::getName — Returns the name of the timezone

Description

public string DateTimeZone::getName ( void )

Returns the name of the timezone.

Parameters

This function has no parameters.

Return Values

One of timezones.
